events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 28th, involving their car and another on a city street.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to references to vehicle collision and car damages in the initial report.
An experienced claims agent was assigned promptly to handle this case and ensure quick communication with the customer.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer confirming receipt and providing next steps for documentation.
The customer was asked to submit accident photos, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with claim evaluation.
All requested documents including police report and vehicle photos were received from the customer on time.
The investigation into the accident details and liability began, with an adjuster reviewing the reports and images.
Investigation concluded with findings confirming the other driver was at fault in the vehicle collision incident.
A settlement offer was proposed covering the repair costs for the damage sustained to the insured's car.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the timely responses.
The claim was formally approved and preparations for payment issuance were initiated following customer acceptance.
Payment for the approved claim amount was disbursed to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover repair expenses.
The claim was successfully closed after full payment issuance and completion of all related procedures.
